Events - Developer
Skip to content
Events
Â¶
Atlan produces events when certain activities occur in the system. You can tap into these in a push-based integration model to take action the moment they occur.
To tap into the events, you need to first set up a
webhook
in Atlan.
Have a look at the
event handling pattern
for more details on implementing event-handling from webhooks using either of the SDKs.
